name: Pass.Barcode
desc: An object that represents a barcode shown on a pass.DeprecatedUse Pass.Barcodes instead.

items.name: altText
items.desc: The text displayed near the barcode. For example, a human-readable version of the barcode data in case the barcode doesn’t scan.The alternative text isn’t displayed for watchOS.

items.name: format
items.desc: The format of the barcode.The barcode format PKBarcodeFormatCode128 isn’t supported for watchOS.

items.name: message
items.desc: The message or payload to display as a barcode.

items.name: messageEncoding
items.desc: The IANA character set name of the text encoding to use to convert message from a string representation to a data representation that the system renders as a barcode, such as “iso-8859-1”
